video.title: Life
video.synopsis: Exonerated after 12 years in prison, a former LAPD cop has his life and job restored, but he brings a new Zen attitude to his work.

episodes.synopsis: After spending 12 years in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Charlie Crews rejoins the force with a shiny new detective badge.
episodes.title: Merit Badge

episodes.synopsis: Det. Charlie Crews and Dani Reese search for the killer of a newlywed bride.
episodes.title: Tear Asunder

episodes.synopsis: Crews and Reese investigate a standard carjacking homicide involving a husband and wife.
episodes.title: Let Her Go

episodes.synopsis: When one man ends up dead in his own home, the hunt is on to find his killer.
episodes.title: What They Saw

episodes.synopsis: When a woman wearing angel wings falls to her death, Det. Charlie Crews and Dani Reese must figure out if she was pushed or if she jumped.
episodes.title: The Fallen Woman

episodes.synopsis: While attending one of her AA meetings, Dani Reese thinks she hears a fellow attendee confess to rape.
episodes.title: Powerless

episodes.synopsis: When two Persian Americans are killed and a third is kidnapped, detectives Charlie Crews and Dani Reese believe they have a hate crime on their hands.
episodes.title: Civil War

episodes.synopsis: When a gas explosion vaporizes half of a man's torso, Charlie Crews and Dani Reese work to figure out if the explosion was an accident or arson.
episodes.title: Farthingale

episodes.synopsis: When a runaway girl is found dead underneath a freeway overpass, Detective Charlie Crews and Dani Reese are struck by the death scene.
episodes.title: Serious Control Issues

episodes.synopsis: Charlie Crews and Dani Reese track the killer of a Zen master who was buried alive 10 years prior.
episodes.title: Dig a Hole

episodes.synopsis: Charlie Crews and Dani Reese arrive on the scene shortly after a woman has shot and killed her husband.
episodes.title: Fill It Up

episodes.synopsis: Detectives Charlie Crews and Dani Reese are on the hunt for a serial killer when three numbered trunks containing suffocated bodies are found.
episodes.title: Find Your Happy Place

episodes.synopsis: Charlie Crews and Dani Reese investigate the death of a family man who was found beaten and bound to a chair at the bottom of an empty pool.
episodes.title: Everything...All the Time

episodes.synopsis: The body of a cancer research scientist is discovered literally frozen solid, baffling Crews and Reese.
episodes.title: The Business of Miracles

episodes.synopsis: A university's prison experiment goes horribly wrong when one of the students, who was acting as a corrections officer, ends up dead.
episodes.title: Not for Nothing

episodes.synopsis: When a female student is found crushed to death, Crews and Reese visit the victim's fiancé and discover he was involved in a complex love triangle.
episodes.title: Crushed

episodes.synopsis: An earthquake hits, and the city is a mess. In the middle of all the havoc, Crews and Reese must track down an escaped criminal and killer.
episodes.title: Did You Feel That?

episodes.synopsis: A woman is found in a pool of blood, sitting at a table prepared for a romantic dinner for two.
episodes.title: Jackpot

episodes.synopsis: When a murder takes place in a mall on the biggest shopping day of the year, Crews and Reese end up searching for more than just the killer.
episodes.title: Black Friday

episodes.synopsis: When a drug dealer and an elementary school teacher are found dead in a rough part of town, it appears to be a typical drug deal gone bad.
episodes.title: Badge Bunny

episodes.synopsis: When a sheriff's deputy is found murdered, Crews and Reese get in the middle of a turf war between tribal police and the sheriff's department.
episodes.title: Evil...and His Brother Ziggy

episodes.synopsis: A food bank deliveryman is found buried, up to his neck, in the backyard of a suburban home.
episodes.title: Canyon Flowers

episodes.synopsis: When three Russians are found dead, the investigation leads Crews and Reese to Russian mobster Roman Nevikov.
episodes.title: Trapdoor

episodes.synopsis: When a retired NASA pilot is shot to death, Crews and Reese work on the list of suspects, which includes the pilot's son and his business partner.
episodes.title: Re-Entry

episodes.synopsis: When the lead singer of a heavy metal cover band is suffocated to death, Charlie Crews and Dani Reese go on the hunt to find the killer.
episodes.title: Mirror Ball

episodes.synopsis: A man with a mouth full of money is found beaten and shot in a house with no roof.
episodes.title: I Heart Mom

episodes.synopsis: When Reese is asked to be part of an FBI task force, Crews and Stark must investigate the murder of a financial adviser who had a fondness for women.
episodes.title: Hit Me Baby

episodes.synopsis: Crews and Stark investigate the death of a soldier who was stabbed in the chest while on leave in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Shelf Life

episodes.synopsis: With Reese still on loan to the FBI, Crews is assigned a new partner: Det. Jane Seever, who is nothing like Reese.
episodes.title: 3 Women

episodes.synopsis: When a Los Angeles coroner is found murdered, his co-workers become prime suspects.
episodes.title: 5 Quarts

episodes.synopsis: Crews and Seever investigate the death of a California state representative who was shot and killed in her home.
episodes.title: Initiative 38

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 2 finale, Crews must locate his partner, Reese, who has gone missing while on loan to the FBI.
episodes.title: One
